alert.note: Alert for Appling; Brantley; Clinch; Echols; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Wayne; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 9:01PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS ALONG A COLD FRONT WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN GILCHRIST... NORTHWESTERN BRADFORD...NORTHWESTERN ALACHUA...COLUMBIA... SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON...NORTHWESTERN NASSAU...BAKER...UNION... SOUTHEASTERN SUWANNEE...NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN...NORTHWESTERN GLYNN... PIERCE...SOUTHEASTERN ECHOLS...BRANTLEY...SOUTHEASTERN CLINCH... CHARLTON...SOUTHEASTERN WARE...WAYNE AND SOUTHEASTERN APPLING COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EST... At 900 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a cold front extending from 8 miles north of Odum to 7 miles west of Ichetucknee Spring. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Lake City, Jesup, Blackshear, Hilliard, Folkston, Lake Butler, Nahunta, White Springs, and Patterson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Brantley; Clinch; Echols; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Wayne; Western Charlton
